QuestData.Title: A Sketchy Request
QuestData.Description:
The tarasek took everything they could get their claws on, including my scouting ledger.
These overgrown lizards hoard trinkets and trophies by the dozens. I am sure that they stashed my ledger away somewhere. Could you keep an eye out for it as you work your way through the pass?
Oh, and $n? If you do manage to find it, please do not look inside. The contents are sort of... personal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Alvi's "Ledger" and return it to Waywatcher Alvi.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah... You really did find it.
In truth, it's more of a sketchbook than a ledger. For as long as I can remember, I've been more interested in doodling than scouting...
<Alvi looses a long, low sigh.>
Maybe if I had actually done my job properly, then Nori wouldn't have gotten hurt.
I have to fix this... but I don't know if I can do it alone.
